ai.summary: A roughly 8.6 km moderate hike in the UK, following a rural return-style route with gentle elevation changes.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain with grassy rural paths, hedgerows, and some compact or uneven surfaces; expect gentle ascents and descents.
ai.safety_notes: Check local weather before you go; wear sturdy footwear; stay on marked paths; carry water and snacks; bring a map or GPS and a charged phone; pack a lightweight waterproof layer; be mindful of mud and livestock on rural sections; daylight hours vary.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing (layers and a waterproof jacket)
Map and compass or reliable GPS
Phone with emergency contacts and a fully charged battery
Hat, sunscreen, and sunglasses for sun protection
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn; winter visits are possible with appropriate gear and daylight.
